Summary: Incredibly bright white light int he morning before the sun came up, took off at incredible speed from standstill
trends: There have been no other sightings in ramapo
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving on ny17 east towards the ramapo toll station. i saw an unusually bright white light in the sky that seemed to be maybe about 1\2 mile away. i stared at it for a minute or so and it did not seem to move and the lights did not dim at all, at first i thought maybe it was the front lights of an airplane because it was so bright. i continued driving and noticed that it had started moving towards the mountains, within maybe 5-6 seconds it must have moved what looked like almost 50 miles ( can't be exact ). to give a reference since the distance may be off. before the object was moving the size of the light was almost the same size as the moon, after about 2 seconds the light was less than half that size and another few seconds it was a tiny speck, then it was gone. there were no clouds obstructing my view of it and it was not going into\through any clouds either. if this was a plane it was really fast. it was not making any turns, just a straight line till it was out of sight.
